English: Informs all party members of the party leader's location.
Indonesian: Menginformasikan semua anggota party tentang lokasi party leader.

English: The party leader orders party members to attack a target.
Indonesian: Party leader memerintahkan anggota party untuk menyerang target.

English: The party leader orders all party members to retreat.
Indonesian: Party leader memerintahkan semua anggota party untuk mundur.

English: Increases the Critical Chance of the next attack of all party members around the leader by 0.5% per party member.
Indonesian: Increases the Critical Chance of the next attack of all party members around the leader by 0.5% per party member.

English: Each party member around the leader increases the party leader's damage by 5%.
Indonesian: Setiap anggota party di sekitar leader menambahkan bonus 5% untuk party leader damage.

English: Increases the chance for Masquerpets to drop unique items.
Indonesian: Meningkatkan kemungkinan Masquerpet menjatuhkan unique item.

English: Party members recover 1.5 times faster. If the party leader is an Assist, party members recover 1.8 times faster.
Indonesian: Anggota party pulih 1,5 kali lebih cepat. Jika party leader adalah anggota Assist party pulih 1,8 kali lebih cepat.

English: Increases the number of items dropped by Masquerpets.
Indonesian: Meningkatkan jumlah item yang dijatuhkan oleh Masquerpets.

English: Each party member gains a 2.5% damage bonus for every party member nearby. This does not apply to the leader if Linked Attack is active.
Indonesian: Setiap anggota party menerima damage bonus 2,5% untuk setiap anggota party di sekitar mereka. Tidak berlaku untuk leader jika Linked Attack aktif.
